content.content: Our equipment has excellent precision and stability.For high viscosity zirconia slurries of various types, high-quality products can be printed.

content.title: Our equipment can be used for printing ceramic pastes—— How it works.
content.creator:
Houti 3D Lab
December 24, 2024
content.content: Our equipment can be used for printing ceramic pastes; Produce high-temperature resistant structural components and dental full crown restorations (all ceramic crowns, all ceramic veneers, etc.)

content.title: Improvement of recycling bin
content.creator:
Houti 3D Lab
December 12, 2024
content.content:
Hi,
In the prototype testing phase, we improved the diameter of the discharge port of the recycling drainage groove to make recycling faster; The improved slot is 5 times larger than the original, so the reflow of consumables after printing will be more than 3 times faster
Bset wishes
Houti 3D  Lab

content.title: Equipment function update~
content.creator:
Houti 3D Lab
December 8, 2024
content.content:
Hi , there
During the recent equipment testing phase, we have integrated the automatic feeding and recycling systems of the equipment into one; When the machine is in use, there is no need to change the material bottle separately, and the recycled consumables do not need to be replaced .Only one hopper is needed, integrating 2 functions for easy material replacement and cleaning;
In the later delivery phase, we will apply this modification to the device.
Bset wishs
Houti 3d Lab
